summary: The diff correctly updates the hardcoded admin credentials in the backend (backend/main.mo) to username 'Azadnexus.global@gmail.com' and password 'Karusu_7'. The validateAdmin function returns a valid session access key on success and null on failure, satisfying REQ-1. A migration module is also added. The frontend login page behavior cannot be verified from the diff, but the backend changes are consistent with supporting the /admin/login flow.

hallucinated_features.description: A migration module (backend/migration.mo) was added that migrates old actor state by stripping the 'adminHashedPassword' field.
hallucinated_features.reason: The build request only asks to update hardcoded credentials and explicitly states not to change any other backend logic or data models beyond what is needed. A migration module was not requested.
